name: KarejjiTekku - A High School Romance
description:
In a world where companies and products go to high school together... a plan is hatched for CollegiTech to meet his match, OneCase-Chan!

In a collaboration between world-famous YouTuber TheRunawaySavior and up-and-coming tech company CollegiTech, a wonderfully sweet and romance-filled adventure has been lovingly crafted from the hearts, minds, and google image searches of our developers.

And there's DEFINITELY NO DLC.
